content: k2tog k1  needle 2 p1 *k3 p1 repeat from * to end of needle  needle 3 k1 ssk knit to end of needle repeat rounds 1 and 2 until needle 1 and 3 each have 12 stitches and needle 2 has 25 stitches 49 total foot round 1  needle 1 knit all stitches  needle 2 purl 1 *k3 purl 1 repeat from * to end of needle  needle 3 knit all stitches repeat round 1 until length of foot measures 2 inches less than total desired length toe  set up round needle 1 knit needle 2 k1 ssk knit to end of needle needle 3 knit  this is to get rid of the extra stitch we added to have a purl 1 at the beginning of that needle round 1 knit all stitches round 2  needle 1 knit to last 3 stitches k2tog k1  needle 2 k1 ssk knit to last 3 stitches k2tog k1  needle 3 k1 ssk knit to end of needle repeat rounds 1 and 2 until you have 3 stitches on needles 1 and 3 and 6 stitches on needle 2 cut yarn leaving 14 inch tail using darning needle use kitchener stitch to close toe turn sock inside out to weave in ends on wrong side repeat all for sock #2 my favorite video to show how to work the kitchener stitch https //knittinghelp com/video/play/kitchener- stitch you can also check youtube for videos
